translations: 神经元，神经细胞（neuron的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Most of the neurons you have in your head,  you had when you were in your mother's uterus.
sentences.translation: 你头脑中的大部分神经元，早在你处于母亲子宫中时就已经拥有。

sentences.sentence: This may be down to our brain's "mirror neurons", which are known to mimic others' actions.
sentences.translation: 这可能是由于我们大脑中的“镜像神经元”，它会模仿他人的行为。

sentences.sentence: Scientists still don't know what triggers the proliferation of neurons in unilateral megalencephaly.
sentences.translation: 科学家仍然不知道是什么触发了单侧巨脑畸形神经元的增殖。
